CustomField.description: This long text field is to be available to the VMWare S&P Vendor page layout so that the information can be captured by Sales Users on the VMware S&P Vendor records and the info can be sent to VMware, via Boomi integration, to increase chances of a successful registration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide any detail you wish to share with VMware sales team
CustomField.label: Notes/Next Steps
